Message:
In the middle of the busy street,
a travelin’ gunslinger
was puttin’ on a show.

The girl’s smile drew people
to her like moths to a flame.
You could just tell how much
she wanted to entertain
everybody passin’ by...

I took one step, and then another,
as if she was drawin’ me in, too.

“Well, looks like some more
guests have joined us,
so let’s kick off another round!”

Spinnin’ and jugglin’
her two pistols with ease,
the girl caught the eye of
everyone who’d gathered there.

Even passersby stopped
in their tracks just to watch her.

Before I knew it,
I’d walked all the way
up to the front...

Even worse, I’d done it
while lookin’ this scruffy...

Just as I was about to
make my way back,

I saw a hand
outstretched before me.
